description:
dark wood; scope attached to top (Leupold); wood unornamented; steel band around mid-section in front of trigger engraved with swirling foliate band; similar engraving on trigger guard; text engraved on band: "G. HOENIG/ MAKER" "MAR. 1997/ SER. NO. 1/ PATENTED" "BOISE ID./ USA;" rubber butt. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
title: Rotary Round-Action Double Rifle
